New Records: Steph Curry scored a season-high 36 points
Key Match Events: Curry caught fire in the third quarter, scoring 17 of his 36 points
Curry drilled two 3-pointers to slam the door in Oklahoma City
Post-Match Reflections: Curry will now prepare to face his former teammate and Splash Brother Klay Thompson in his highly-anticipated return to the Bay Area with the Dallas Mavericks on Tuesday night
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sunday marked Curry's first 30-point performance of the season
In seven games, Curry is averaging 22 points on 47.5% shooting from the field and 43.5% from beyond the arc
